name.ja: TikTokコメントエクスポーター
name.th: ผู้ส่งออกความคิดเห็น TikTok

short.ar: قم بتصدير تعليقات tiktok من صفحة منشورات TikTok إلى ملف XLS/CSV

short.gu: TikTok ના પોસ્ટ પેજ પરથી XLS/CSV ફાઇલમાં ટિકટોક ટિપ્પણીઓ નિકાસ કરો

short.te: TikTok పోస్ట్ పేజీ నుండి tiktok వ్యాఖ్యలను XLS/CSV ఫైల్‌కి ఎగుమతి చేయండి

short.uk: Експортуйте коментарі tiktok зі сторінки дописів TikTok у файл XLS/CSV

short.zh_CN: 将 TikTok 帖子页面中的 tiktok 评论导出到 XLS/CSV 文件

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Effortlessly export TikTok comments data from the post page to a XLS/CSV file.

🔧 How it Works:
1️⃣ Open a TikTok post page.
2️⃣ Click the Download button next to the comments.     
3️⃣ Done! Sit back and just wait a moment, let our extension handle the rest.

🔥 Key Features:
1️⃣ Run in post page for every posts.
2️⃣ Running solely on your local machine, no need to worry about any privacy concerns, all data remains on your local device.
3️⃣ Export comments data to a xls/csv file, data include: Cid, Comment Language, Create Time, Digg Count, Reply Comment Total, Text, User Nickname, User Uid, User Unique Id, User Avatar Thumb, User Url, Origin Post Url.

🎯 Targeted Users: business owners, data analysts, and competitor researchers alike.

💡 Benefit from our dedicated support team! We're here to assist you at every step and provide prompt, knowledgeable help.

💪 Take control of your business data management and make informed decisions with TikTok Comment Exporter today!

Note: This extension is an independent creation and is not affiliated with or endorsed by TikTok❗️🔒
